description:
http://anidb.net/ch7407 [Kasuga Kyousuke] and his family have had to move several times after being seen using their esper powers. Upon settling for the seventh time, Kyousuke briefly meets a pretty girl who gives him her red straw-hat and falls in love with her on sight. On the first day of school he learns this girl is his junior high classmate http://anidb.net/ch7408 [Ayukawa Madoka], who, contrary to his initial impression, is feared as a delinquent. Their underclassman and Madoka`s best friend, http://anidb.net/ch7428 [Hiyama Hikaru], sees Kyousuke use his powers to sink an impressive basketball shot and falls in love with him. Kyousuke ends up dating Hikaru while constantly struggling with his feelings for Madoka due to his indecisiveness. Likewise, Madoka has feelings for Kyousuke which she masks with her capricious nature for fear of hurting her friend Hikaru.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
Kyosuke is new in town and has an encounter with a mysterious girl, later revealed to be Madoka, a local delinquent and his classmate. Also, did I mention he and his family have psychic powers?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Transfer Student! `Tis Embarrassing to Say, but I`ll Fall in Love for the First Time

転校生!恥ずかし ながら初恋します

Madoka continues to catch Kyosuke`s eye, while Hikaru not only falls in love with him, but accidentally kisses him!
